title: Riot, i would like to inquire about the season reset.
body: Rito please, please from the most humble and authentic origins. I on behalf of the OCE league community would kindly like to request that you please hurry up in Rito HQ so that we brainwashed nerds can all enjoy your game, and the new dynamic queue in all its glory. Please I've been staring at my screen constant refreshing reddit, the oce boards etc to see if there is any news on the state of the reset. Please. Rito.

replies.body: IT UP M8 Time to slay the rift
Why is there not at least any news on this  {{champion:32}}
